terminals.name: UnitofTime
terminals.description: The units for the stream's timestamps.

terminals.name: StreamType
terminals.description: The data type of the stream. Numeric is any integer (signed or unsigned) or float. An Object is any JSON-serializable construct

terminals.name: Timezone
terminals.description: The timezone of this stream's timestamps

terminals.name: SourceName
terminals.description: This is the top-level name used by the plotter to index the data sources

terminals.name: Building
terminals.description: The name of the building containing the stream. Use the full name of the building

terminals.name: Floor
terminals.description: The name of the floor containing the stream. Use a number whenever possible

terminals.name: Room
terminals.description: The name of the room containing the stream. Use a number whenever possible

terminals.name: Exposure
terminals.description: The cardinal direction this stream is concerned with

terminals.name: Type
terminals.description: Describes at a high level the role of the stream

terminals.name: Sensor
terminals.description: What the transducer associated with this stream measures

terminals.name: State
terminals.description: What device setting this stream reflects

terminals.name: Setpoint
terminals.description: Which writable setting this stream influences

terminals.name: Command
terminals.description: Which writable setting this stream can actuate

terminals.name: Manufacturer
terminals.description: The name of the manufacturer for this device

terminals.name: Type
terminals.description: The type of HVAC device this entity represents
